attributes.action: Make it illgeal for any council to sell of land
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We want to make it illegal for any council to sell of land that had council housing on it to private developers. Only not for profit developers should be allowed to build on this land, as they will be providing rental properties for those people who need it most. In Manchester they are knocking down as many flats as they can, selling of the land and the developers are making flats etc, but not social house people can afford.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
